metadata.synopsis: A trio of Rivington locals complain about the way their letters have been treated by the local post-office. This is the halfling female one liner.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - go to 9.5;47.5; -20- Talk to the female Halfling of the missing letters vignette.

0.speaker: Sylvie Summerworth
0.text: Do not, under any circumstances, employ Sword Coast Couriers! Their service is appalling.

1.speaker: Sylvie Summerworth
1.text: I am this close to buying and training a pigeon to send my own post! Oh, now there's an idea...
